title: Coven Leader

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to kill each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- With the Necronomicon you gain empowered offense or defense. You may switch this choice at any time.
- With empowered offense you have a Powerful Attack and Roleblock immunity.
- With empowered defense you have Basic Defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven.

desc:
Post 3861
*Okay but this role doesn't really instill fear like it did in ToS.*
